title: Brent Lee Regan [2009] False Flags & Patsies
description:
Brent Lee Regan [2009] False Flags & Patsies

01 Nogotium Perambulous in Tenebris

02 Bin Laden: Take 7/7 (Acoustic Remix)

SONG INFO:

01 - Nogotium:

Hook:
Remind the masters the masses are in control
Reclaim the streets / Reclaim the roads
So we can all march together on Bohemian Grove
Cuz there's a battle here on earth for your mind, matter and soul

02 - Bin-Laden:

Hook:
Bin-Laden did not blow up London...
It was you Tony / Tell the truth!
It was Blair who gave the order...
And Mi5 conducted the slaughter!

This song is an acoustic cover/remix of an Immortal Technique song: Bin-Laden feat. Mos Def (Street). Whereas in the original, Immortal Technique accused the Bush administration of orchestrating the 9/11 attack and using the subsequent War on Terror to spread an Anglo-American domination over the world, Brent Lee Regan turns his attention to Tony BlairÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s administration in this remix and claims that the 7/7 attacks in London was also a False Flag carried out by covert operations in order to stay the course.


ARTIST INFO: Brent Lee Regan (born 17th of May 1979 in Swindon, UK) is an alternative hip hop artist from the UK whose lyrical delivery and content is as varied as his musical style. 

Honest and inquisitive; cynical yet hopeful, Brent Lee ReganÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s lyrics often unapologetically address the power struggles and paradigm shifts in the shady world of politics, religion and the human condition.
